Uses of Interface
com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.MatchProcessor

  • Packages that use MatchProcessor 
    Package Description
    com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex
    This package contains the classes that are needed to apply regular expressions on character streams.
    com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.nomatch  
    com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.saxlike

      Classes in com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex that implement MatchProcessor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMatchProcessor
      Helps to return a MatchProcessorResult that cannot cause an endless loop.
      class  ReplacingProcessor
      This MatchProcessor replaces the matching text (given by the MatchResult) with the configured replacement.

      Constructor and Description
      RegexModifier(OnStreamMatcher matcher, MatchProcessor matchProcessor, int minimumLengthOfLookBehind, int newNumberOfChars)
      Creates a modifier that matches a regular expression on character streams and does 'something' if matches are found.
      RegexModifier(String regex, int flags, MatchProcessor matchProcessor, int minimumLengthOfLookBehind, int newNumberOfChars)
      See RegexModifier.RegexModifier(String, int, String, int, int).

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StateMachine
      This MatchProcessor changes the OnStreamMatcher that is used by a RegexModifier if another State is reached.
      class  Transitions
      Represents the transitions that lead away from a start state to the end states.
      Constructors in com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful with parameters of type MatchProcessor 
      Constructor and Description
      State(String stateName, String regex, MatchProcessor matchProcessor)
      If the constructed state is reached then the given MatchProcessor modifies the stream.

      Constructor and Description
      Token(String name, String regex, MatchProcessor matchProcessor)
